00019 #ifndef _OBSERVABLE_H
00020 #define _OBSERVABLE_H
00021 #include <vector>
00022 
00023 class Observable;
00024 class Observer;
00025 class MultipleObserver;
00026 
00027 class Observable
00028 {
00029 public:
00030    Observable();
00031    Observable(Observer* obs);
00032    void addObserver(Observer* obs);
00033    bool removeObserver(Observer* obs); // Returns true if successful.
00034    void hasChanged();
00035    
00036 private:
00037    std::vector<Observer*> observers;
00038    
00039    void notifyObservers();
00040    void setDefaults();
00041 };
00042 
00043 class Observer
00044 {
00045 public:
00046    Observer();
00047    Observer(Observable* obs);
00048    void setObserved(Observable* obs);
00049    
00050    virtual void notify(Observable *notifier) = 0; // This will get called by observed whenever it changes.
00051    
00052 private:
00053    Observable* observed;
00054 };
00055 
00056 class MultipleObserver : public Observer
00057 {
00058 public:
00059    MultipleObserver();
00060    MultipleObserver(Observable* obs);
00061    void addObserved(Observable* obs);
00062    void removeObserved(Observable* obs);
00063    void removeAllObserved();
00064    
00065    // virtual void notify(Observable* notifier); // Don't forget to overload from class Observer.
00066    
00067 private:
00068    std::vector<Observable*> obsVec;
00069 };
00070 
00071 #endif  /* _OBSERVABLE_H */
